message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I believe I can only justify a purchase price of $9,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. How about we split the difference and settle at $10,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value you place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with our discussion.
